    • Method Detail

      • inLobby

        public boolean inLobby()
        Checks that current game is in lobby.
        Returns:
        true if the tab is opened.

      • getCurrentTab

        public int getCurrentTab()
        Gets the currently open tab.
        Returns:
        The currently open tab or the logout tab by default.

      • open

        public boolean open(int i)
        Opens the specified tab at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        i - The tab to open.
        Returns:
        true if tab successfully selected; otherwise false.

      • getSelectedWorld

        public int getSelectedWorld()
        Finds out which world is selected from the lobby interface.
        Returns:
        The world number that is currently selected

      • getAvailableWorlds

        public java.lang.String[] getAvailableWorlds(boolean includingFull)
        Finds all available worlds if in lobby.
        Parameters:
        includingFull - If true it will include all full worlds when returned
        Returns:
        All available worlds as a String arrat

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(int world,
                  boolean includeFull)
        Checks if the chosen world is open.
        Parameters:
        world -
        includeFull -
        Returns:
        true is available, else false

      • switchWorlds

        public boolean switchWorlds(int world)
        Enters a world from the lobby.
        Parameters:
        world -
        Returns:
        true If correctly entered the world else false
        See Also:
        switchWorld(int world)

      • getWorldComponent

        Gets the component of any world on the lobby interface
        Parameters:
        world -
        Returns:

      • logout

        public boolean logout()
        Used for logging out if in lobby
        Returns:
        true if correctly logged out else false
